name: Accessibility & Security
description: Rules for ensuring accessibility standards and security best practices

rules.name: WCAG Compliance
guidelines: Ensure all features meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards
Ensure keyboard navigation for all interactive elements

rules.name: Accessibility Testing
guidelines: Use automated tools like axe-core for initial checks
Perform manual testing with screen readers
Test keyboard navigation for all features

rules.name: Authentication & Authorization
rules.description: Standards for secure authentication and authorization
guidelines: Use Django's authentication system and permission classes
Implement proper input validation for all user inputs
Protect against common vulnerabilities (XSS, CSRF, SQL injection)
Follow the principle of least privilege for access control

rules.name: Data Protection
guidelines: Encrypt sensitive data at rest and in transit
Implement proper error handling without exposing sensitive information
Comply with relevant regulations (GDPR, CCPA, etc.)
